text: “Ndipo kwa anthu (a mtundu) wa Samud, (tidatuma) m’bale wawo Swaleh. Adati: “E inu anthu anga! Lambirani Allah. Mulibe mulungu wina koma Iye Yekha. Iye adakuumbani ndi nthaka ndi kukukhazikani m’menemo. Ndipo mpempheni chikhululuko (pa zolakwa zanu), kenako tembenukirani kwa Iye. Ndithu Mbuye wanga ali pafupi (ndi akapolo Ake). Ndipo Ngovomera mapempho (aopempha).”
